changes: Updated ammo values

summary: *NEW - Updated Flea Market API to be more efficient
Added new Woods extractions (Bridge Extraction, Northern UN Roadblock, Eastern Rocks, Scav Bridge)
Expect frequent updates over the next couple days with the new patch
changes: Updated Flea Market API to be more efficient. Also started tracking how many times items are searched for daily
Updated the Woods map with the new expansion
Added new Woods extractions. Removed Cliff Descent extraction
Added 14 new caches on Woods
Updated Customs map. Added basement for Warehouse 4. Added interiors for Fortress
Added 3 new Caches to Customs
Updated ammo. Added new .300 & .338 ammo
Updated some required task items

summary: Added cardinal direction to maps (Factory, Interchange, Woods)
Flipped Woods map to match cardinal directions
changes: Updated most maps with cardinal directions now that the compass is in the game.
Woods was flipped to match the cardinal directions
Woods has some extract names that now conflict with the in game cardinal directions
Added the Caches page. View maps of all caches on the maps that have them.
Added the Flea Market Prices page. You can search for any item and get up to date prices.
Data provided by Tarkov-Market
Added ZB-013 extract on Customs
Added screenshot for D-2 extract

summary: Updated ammo, several new rounds were added
Updated thorax health to 85 on scatter plot breakpoints
changes: New ammo: 9x19 mm QuakeMaker, 9x19 mm 7N31, .45 ACP Hydr-Shock, .45 ACP Lasermatch FMJ, .45 ACP AP, .366 AP, 7.62x51 mm M993
Added new keys that are found on the Shoreline scav boss Sanitar: Key Card With a Strip of Duct Tape & Key With Tape
Thorax health was changed from 80 to 85

summary: Updated Reserve map, added underground area
changes: Reserve map was updated with the new underground area
Added the key use locations for the 3 new reserve keys
Added the new Reserve extract location

summary: Added ability to view detailed ammo value changes when there have been updates to ammo
Added toggle switch on ammo chart to show or hide all calibers
changes: Ammo data was updated, changes to .366
You can now view exactly what ammo data has been changed when ammo gets updated. See the 'CLICK HERE TO VIEW RECENT AMMO CHANGES' button on the Ammo page
Toggling the 'Show All Calibers' switch on the ammo chart will show or hide all ammo on the chart, so you can easily hide everything and select only the caliber you want.

summary: Updated Task and Hideout required items list
changes: Updated Task and Hideout required items list.
Was missing the Fishing Place task and the new items for the Collector task.
Some item quantities were incorrect as well. Those have been fixed.

summary: Updated a few key spawns, lock locations, and extracts.
changes: Updated image for Armored Train extract.
Updated lock location for RB-MP11 key
Added new spawn for Dorm Room 214 key
Added images for RB-ORB1 and RB-ORB2 spawns
Added image for one of Labs Red Keycard spawn
Small update to Reserve map
Added the new map for Woods.

summary: Added EFTFG Map files to the 'More Resources' page
changes: Added the new map for Reserve.
All EFTFG maps are now available on the 'More Resources' page. Feel free to save them.

summary: Revamped the Required Loot Items page
changes: Required loot items are now split up better and display the required amounts for individual tasks and hideout modules.

summary: Updated required loot items for tasks for patch 12.6
changes: Ammo values have been updated (all .366 rounds got a damage nerf)
Required loot items for tasks have been updated. Lots of items were changed to be found in raid, but have had their quantities reduced.

summary: There is now locations for both spawn locations and use locations for keys and maps
Added support for keys that have spawns/use on multiple maps (eg: Factory Key)
changes: Can now toggle between the spawn locations and key use locations on the Keys page.
Can toggle between maps if a key spawns on multiple maps or can be used on multiple maps.
Added a few new spawn locations for keys (Labs Red Keycard, RB-ORB1, & RB-ORB2).
Screenshots of key use locations will be added in the near future.
Added new custom map for Labs. Updated all extraction and key data for Labs

summary: Added new maps for Interchange and Factory
changes: Scatter plot chart has been update. The axis have been flipped, damage is now on the bottom (x-axis) and penetration on the left (y-axis)
Added visual breakpoints on the chart for armor and health (only showing head and thorax HP as they are the important ones)
Added new custom made maps for Interchange and Factory. I hope to keep making these and will focus on ones that don't have good maps available (Labs and Reserve are priority)
Added ULTRA Medical Storage Key
Added new Interchange extractions (Scav Camp, Hole In Fence, and Saferoom Exfil)
Added new Interchange Keycards (Object #21WS and Object #11SR)
Update ammo (5.7x28 mm SS190: Damage: 57 -> 49, Penetration: 32 -> 37)
Added Shturman Key
Added USEC Stash on Customs Key
Added Key to HEP Station Storage

summary: Added screenshots for all extraction points
Updated screenshots for some key spawns
changes: Factory, Interchange, Customs, Shoreline, Woods, and Labs now have screenshots for all extraction points.
Fixed and updated details for several extractions
Update screenshot for Idea Cash Register key.
Update screenshot for ZB-014 key.
Update screenshot for Oli Logistics Dept Office key.

summary: Full app rewrite, lots of changes

Update ammo spreadsheet, header is now fixed
Update ammo scatter plot chart. Can now hover to preview calibre values
Removed Content Creators page
Removed Checklist page
Added Required Items page
Added more items to the More Resources page
Full rewrite, lots of improvements across the app
Updated all ammo values
Update spreadsheet component

summary: Added all known spawns for Reserve keys
Updated some prices on the item values table
changes: All known key spawns for the Reserve keys are now marked, with screenshots and video.

The prices for the following items were updated/added: Bitcoin, Broken GPhone, Electric Drill, Fuel Conditioner, Gunpowder (Kite, Hawk & Eagle), Morphone, Elite Pliers, Long Flat Screwdriver, PSU, Wires, Silencerco Hybrid 46 Suppressor, Holosun HS401G5 Reflex Sight, Powercord, Broken LCD, Pile of Meds, Silicone Tube, Analog Thermometer, Capacitors, NIXXOR Lens, Lightbulb, Disposable Syringe, Water Filter, Akali, IFAK, Radiator Helix.
Updated ammo
Added Reserve extractions with images
Added RB-AM Military Base Key
Updated Interchange extract names
Improved compression of key spawn images and moved them to a CDN
Added the map extractions page with all extracts for each map.
Works the same as the Key Spawn maps. Search by extract name or by map.
